items.content_html: A cross-platform chat application built with Tauri, designed to be a minimalist, high-performance, and lightweight alternative to Discord. Optimized for speed and simplicity, it delivers a smooth and responsive user experience without compromising on functionality.

items.content_html: Implementation of MQTT protocol over TCP, designed for web applications. Built with TypeScript, this MQTT client allows for efficient message queuing and lightweight messaging between devices. It supports core MQTT functionalities, including PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE, and acknowledgment handling, making it suitable for real-time applications.
items.title: DiogoCunhaCardoso/MQQT-Client: Implementation of MQTT protocol over TCP, designed for web applications. Built with TypeScript, this MQTT client allows for efficient message queuing and lightweight messaging between devices. It supports core MQTT functionalities, including PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE, and acknowledgment handling, making it suitable for real-time applications.

items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: pradeepbgs/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient Inventory Management System that enables users to manage stock levels, track sales, and generate reports. Features include CRUD operations for inventory items, customer management, and export functionality. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless and user-friendly interactions.

Features include CRUD operations for inventory items, customer management, and export functionality. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless and user-friendly interactions.

items.content_html: A lightweight package that allows users to create, manage, and organize notes with features such as adding tags, editing content, and searching through notes. It provides a simple and intuitive frontend for seamless note management, making it easy to store and retrieve important information.
